title: LG Refrigerator FILTER ASSEMBLY,AIR CLEANER
description: LG Refrigerator FILTER ASSEMBLY,AIR CLEANER ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 16 Reviews PartSelect Number PS16222687 Manufacturer Part Number ADQ73214408 This OEM LG refrigerator air filter effectively reduces odors and impurities, keeping your refrigerator fresh. Constructed with activated carbon, it measures 3 inches by 3 inches by 5 inches and fits select LG and Kenmore Elite models. Installation is tool-free and takes less than five minutes. Replace the filter every six months or as indicated by the filter light. Refer to your owner’s manual to confirm compatibility and for detailed instructions.

installationInstructions.author: Theresa from DEERFIELD BCH, FL
installationInstructions.title: Manufacture says every 6 months so that's what I do to keep from having a problem
installationInstructions.content: popped out popped right in ran water thru to get out air in line and waalaa it was done
